Name: received
Description: Number of MQTT messages received from all subscribed Global Broker(s)

Name: received_errors
Description: Number of received messages with message errors

Name: received_duplicate
Description: Number of messages already received via other subscribed Global Broker and/or for which data is already on the cache

Name: received_withcontent
Description: Number of messages where data is extracted from message content field

Name: published
Description: Number of MQTT messages published for Global Broker

Name: published_errors
Description: Number of publish errors on local message broker for GC messages

Name: downloaded
Description: Number of data items downloaded to Global Cache

Name: downloaded_errors
Description: Number of download errors for Global Cache data

Name: dataserver_status
Description: Status of WIS2 Node dataserver (1 - up
